text: "Cut the Cord" is a 2015 song by American rock band Shinedown. It is the leading single from their fifth studio album Threat to Survival. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart and was the theme song to WWE's Hell in a Cell (2015). ==Track listing== #"Cut the Cord" #"Black Cadillac" == References == Category:2015 songs Category:Shinedown songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Cut the Cord
